After the attacks, Train Wreck's outer surface was black and his wheels wer=
e smashed in.

Train Wreck: That all ya got?...

  ----- Original Message -=
---- 
  From: Legendarynemasis@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sen=
t: Saturday, July 14, 2001 8:44 PM
  Subject: Re: Clash


  Vile smirks as =
he watches Trainwreck sustain the firepower, however he would 
  not be abl=
e to do that for much longer. 

  Vile: "Gemini, form the Gemini Dragon and=
 teach this train to have respect 
  for the past!" 

  Gemini 1 and 2 nod =
before each leaps up high into the air and glows. The 
  clouds above begin=
s to swirl. Thunder begins to crackle as the sounds of 
  transforming can =
be heard from a above a second later the clouds literally 
  are sent scatt=
ering as a massive "meched out" double headed dragon around 45 
  feet tall=
 descends from them, its massive wings flapping wildly as 18 square 
  like=
 objects surround it. Both heads roar loudly and then speak at the same 
  =
time their voice having an echo to it. 

  Gemini Dragon: "Destruction shal=
l be dealt unto all..." 

  Vile looks up at the massive beast and smirks b=
efore he flys back and away 
  from Trainwreck a nice Distance. Methos who =
is ontop of Trainwreck also looks 
  up at Gemini Dragon. He then somehow s=
weatdrops and then flys off Trainwreck 
  as if he was being chased by an a=
rmy of Maximals with spark extractors. Up in 
  the air the Gemini Dragon's=
 right head shoots forward and unleashes a massive 
  stream of flame at Tr=
ainwreck, at the same time the left head shoots out a 
  nice large stream =
of liquid Nitrogen at the wheels of the chosen mafia 
  member... From the =
front Vile unleashes another two antimatter blasts at 
  Trainwreck. 
  You=
r use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
